nodes.text: Dace Bonearm was a male Human bounty hunter active in the Outer Rim Territories during the height of the Galactic Civil War. Dace would frequently associate with the assassin droid IG-72. In 0 BBY, Dace and IG-72 both accepted bounties from Jabba the Hutt in his townhouse in Mos Eisley, meeting with him immediately after Greedo accepted the bounty on Han Solo.
